description: A single process for how a group of molecules called nucleotides were made on the early Earth, before life began, has been suggested by a UCL-led team of researchers.
title: How RNA formed at the origins of life

author: Ros Wynne Jones
description: The BBC real life drama told the story of Three Girls - but it is feared there are thousands who are victims of abuse
title: Three Girls was the story of my life - and there are thousands more like us

description: Soundgarden and Audioslave frontman Chris Cornell took his own life in a Detroit hotel room, according to the city's medical examiner.
title: Chris Cornell took his own life, autopsy reveals

author: BBC News
description: A Humboldt penguin chick has hatched at a sea life sanctuary for the first time in more than a decade.
title: Hunstanton Sea Life Sanctuary's first Humboldt penguin chick in decade

description: A Humboldt penguin chick has hatched at a sea life sanctuary for the first time in more than a decade.

author: Lydia Ramsey
description: GV (formerly Google Ventures)'s life sciences team also have careers as researchers, doctors, and professors.
title: Google Ventures' life-sciences team has a second job — and it helps them make better investments

author: Lisa Hutchinson
description: Frankie Hendry, from Newcastle, will start gruelling chemotherapy treatment tomorrow and possibly undergo life saving surgery
title: Baby girl fighting for her life after family photos revealed deadly eye cancer

author: Deborah Cornelious
description: With special focus on the colourful aspects of LGBTQIH life, the eighth Kashish Mumbai International Queer Film Festival expands its cinematic scale. Plus 10 must-watch films
title: 10 must-watch films on the colourful aspects of LGBTQIH life

description: The 2006 Australian film Candy exposed Megan Bannister's former life as a heroin addict and prostitute. Her redemption story has largely gone unnoticed — until now.
title: Real-life Candy reveals 'horrific' path from drug addiction to redemption

description: SARATOGA SPRINGS, N.Y. (AP) — Oprah Winfrey advised graduates at Skidmore College to follow their "inner truth" and live a spiritual life during a commencement speech Saturday in upstate New York. The author, actress and former talk show host spoke at the graduation in Saratoga Springs, where one of the more than 600 members of the Class of 2017 included a student who had attended her Leadership Academy. The media mogul opened the academy in 2007 for poor girls in South Africa.
title: Winfrey extols life of 'inner truth' at Skidmore graduation
